name: Charon (Neutrino2112)
description:
Plot: Charon is the legendary Boatsman of Styx that takes the souls of the dead from the lands of the alive to Hades. But what if the Gods are sick of human-produced stress? Well, now Hades and the lands of the Gods got industrialized and everywhere is machinery. In this Game jobless Charon searches for a soul who got taken by the machinery to transport him to the afterlife. Can you help him save his dearest friend from the automata?

Charon is a 2D platformer developed in Unity by my team and I as a semester project for our Master's in Digital Games.
